overview: The British, zero budget, mumblecore, drama comedy. Robin might smoke too much weed and drink too much beer, but he is a creative and charming guy. For some reason he fails at everything; girls, friendship, work. After some time alone he gets back in touch with best friend Steve who attempts to help him with work and love. Steve gets him back on track - but is it the right track for Robin?
tagline: How do you fit in, when youâ€™re so far out?
title: Polar
